attackStats.name: LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/agile-throwing.png} tip={Agile Throwing (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/elemental-harmony.png} tip={Elemental Harmony (Beginner Skill)} val={+1 per 2 levels}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/call-of-cygnus.png} tip={Call of Cygnus (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/elemental-expert.png} tip={Elemental Expert (Beginner Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/cygnus-blessing.png} tip={Cygnus Blessing (Link Skill)} val={+25}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/spirit-projection.png} tip={Spirit Projection (3rd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/throwing-expert.png} tip={Throwing Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-blessing.png} tip={Dark Blessing (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/vitality-siphon-reinforce.png} tip={Vitality Siphon - Reinforce (Hyper Skill)} val={+60}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}>

buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/vitality-siphon.png} tip={Vitality Siphon (4th Job)} dur={[15s](10% HP | Barrier)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/transcendent-cygnuss-blessing.png} tip={Transcendent Cygnus's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[45s](-5% | 120s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Eckhart to become a Night Walker

build: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/haste.png} tip={Haste}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/lucky-seven.png} tip={Lucky Seven}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/throwing-mastery.png} tip={Throwing Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/agile-throwing.png} tip={Agile Throwing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/adaptive-darkness.png} tip={Adaptive Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/critical-throw.png} tip={Critical Throw}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/bat-affinity.png} tip={Bat Affinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spark.png} tip={Shadow Spark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw}>

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/darkness-ascending.png} tip={Darkness Ascending}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/spirit-projection.png} tip={Spirit Projection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/alchemic-adrenaline.png} tip={Alchemic Adrenaline}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/adaptive-darkness-ii.png} tip={Adaptive Darkness II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/enveloping-darkness.png} tip={Enveloping Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-servant.png} tip={Dark Servant}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/bat-affinity-ii.png} tip={Bat Affinity II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-momentum.png} tip={Shadow Momentum}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star}>

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/vitality-siphon.png} tip={Vitality Siphon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/adaptive-darkness-iii.png} tip={Adaptive Darkness III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/throwing-expert.png} tip={Throwing Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/bat-affinity-iii.png} tip={Bat Affinity III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-slip.png} tip={Shadow Slip}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/call-of-cygnus.png} tip={Call of Cygnus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-blessing.png} tip={Dark Blessing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-stitch.png} tip={Shadow Stitch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen.png} tip={Dark Omen}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star.png} tip={Quintuple Star}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star-reinforce.png} tip={Quintuple Star - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star-boss-rush.png} tip={Quintuple Star - Boss Rush}> Quintuple Star - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Dark Omen - Cooldown Cutter}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen-reinforce.png} tip={Dark Omen - Reinforce}> Dark Omen - Cooldown Cutter and Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/vitality-siphon-reinforce.png} tip={Vitality Siphon - Reinforce}> Vitality Siphon - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat (1st Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star.png} tip={Quintuple Star (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen.png} tip={Dark Omen (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dominion.png} tip={Dominion (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good

3 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/lucky-seven.png} tip={Lucky Seven (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat (1st Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spark.png} tip={Shadow Spark (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star.png} tip={Quintuple Star (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen.png} tip={Dark Omen (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-stitch.png} tip={Shadow Stitch (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dominion.png} tip={Dominion (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Dormi and the members of the Night Walker Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Dark Attribute & Throwing Star Skills + Dark Sight
content: All of Night Walker's attacks are dark-attribute including <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-servant.png} tip={Dark Servant (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-illusion.png} tip={Shadow Illusion (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/greater-dark-servant.png} tip={Greater Dark Servant (5th Job)}> clones, <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}> bats, and <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spear.png} tip={Shadow Spear (5th Job)}> shadow spears. In 5th Job, successful dark-attribute attacks allows <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spear.png} tip={Shadow Spear (5th Job)}> Shadow Spear to gather dark energy until a spear appears that strikes enemies
Throwing Star skills refer to skills that consume Throwing Stars to use. The skills below have interaction with Throwing Star skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> Dark Elemental (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> Shadow Bat (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-servant.png} tip={Dark Servant (3rd Job)}> Dark Servant (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}> Ravenous Bat (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-illusion.png} tip={Shadow Illusion (Hyper Skill)}> Shadow Illusion (Hyper Skill)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/greater-dark-servant.png} tip={Greater Dark Servant (5th Job)}> Greater Dark Servant (5th Job)_>

There are also skills listed as 'Throw' skills. Throw-type skills have two parts, the initial attack and the final attack - both attacks count towards successful Throwing Star attacks. Only the final attack is dark-attribute for Throw-type skills (except for <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/rapid-throw.png} tip={Rapid Throw (5th Job)}> where both attacks are dark-attribute). These skills are also Throwing Star skills however have unique interactions with the skills below:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-jump.png} tip={Shadow Jump (1st Job)}> Shadow Jump (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-dodge.png} tip={Shadow Dodge (1st Job)}> Shadow Dodge (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-momentum.png} tip={Shadow Momentum (3rd Job)}> Shadow Momentum (3rd Job)_>
Below are a list of all your Throw-type skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/triple-throw.png} tip={Triple Throw (2nd Job)}> Triple Throw (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quad-star.png} tip={Quad Star (3rd Job)}> Quad Star (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star.png} tip={Quintuple Star (4th Job)}> Quintuple Star (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/rapid-throw.png} tip={Rapid Throw (5th Job)}> Rapid Throw (5th Job)_>
<em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

In 1st Job, <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> Dark Sight is unlocked that allows you to dodge certain attacks. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Max Hits: 1
primary.desc: Strike forward damaging multiple enemies

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Luck increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Throwing Stars Cost: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 110%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throw a barrage of stars forward

primary.name: Dark Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Hit enemies with Throwing Stars Skill for a 20% chance to create a Mark of Darkness that stacks 2 times. Marked enemies will take 80% damage over time per stack every second for 15 seconds, and if Night Walkers attack these enemies, they'll ignore 4% defense per stacked Mark of Darkness.
primary.desc: While toggled, Throwing Star attacks have a chance to apply a stack of 'Mark of Darkness'
details: [Mark of Darkness]: Enemy takes increased %Ignore DEF and is dealt damage over time

primary.name: Shadow Bat
primary.shortDesc: Summons a Shadow Bat for 60 sec for every 3 times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: 2.\nWhen using a Throwing Star skill, there is a 50% chance for it to fly towards the target and inflict 150% damage, then bounce off 3 enemies and inflicts the same amount of damage before disappearing. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +35%.\nRecovers 1% of Max HP on first damage.
primary.desc: While toggled, every 3 successful Throwing Star attacks, a Shadow Bat is summoned that has a chance to attack nearby enemies upon successful Throwing Star attacks
details: Enemies marked with <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> have a guaranteed chance to trigger the bats to attack<bp_Additional bats will be created based on the number of stacks_>
Can not be used at the same time as <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}>
Bats can bounce off to damage multiple enemies
Initial hit will restore some %Max HP
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shadow Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nUsing the Jump Key during throwing skills will cause you to enter Dark Sight state for 2 sec.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP while the triggered Dark Sight is active, its remaining duration will be reduced by 20% of the full duration.
primary.desc: Double jump skill, can be used twice in a row
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot using <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-jump.png} tip={Shadow Jump (1st Job)}> or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

If the skill is used during a Throw-type attack, the final attack will be cancelled and you will briefly enter <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}><bp_While in the triggered <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly_>
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF that allows you to jump in place unless you press the Left / Right Arrow Key while jumping

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot attack or be hit by enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again or using an attack will cancel Dark Sight
You can use <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-jump.png} tip={Shadow Jump (1st Job)}> while in Dark Sight
Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged

primary.name: Shadow Dodge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7. Allows you to move a certain distance backwards.\nUsing during throwing skills will cause you to enter Dark Sight state for 2 sec.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP while the triggered Dark Sight is active, its remaining duration will be reduced by 20% of the full duration.
primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: Can be used while casting other skills and while in the air

If the skill is used during a Throw-type attack, the final attack will be cancelled and you will briefly enter <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}><bp_While in the triggered <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly_>
While dashing, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +15%

primary.name: Triple Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Throwing Stars Cost: 3, Damage: 210% 2 times, Damage: 420% 1 time
primary.desc: Throw 3 stars at a single enemy
details: The last star will deal increased damage
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Shadow Spark
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 3. When shuriken explodes, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throws a star that pierces through enemies before exploding

primary.name: Throwing Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +50%, Damage: +30%, Throwing Stars: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Throwing Star slot can hold

primary.name: Agile Throwing
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Luck: +20

primary.name: Bat Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Shadow Bat's Attack Chance: 20%, Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 1
details: Increases activation chance, number of bounces, and %p Damage
Increases the maximum number of bats up to 3

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 40%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 3
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack and damage over time dealt per stack

primary.name: Critical Throw
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +35%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 60

primary.name: Quad Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, Throwing Stars Cost: 4, Damage: 220% 3 times, Damage: 660% 1 time.\n[Passive Effect: Shadow Spark Damage: +100% points]
primary.desc: Throw 4 stars at a single enemy
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spark.png} tip={Shadow Spark (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
The last star will deal increased damage
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Dark Servant
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Summon Duration: 180 sec. Your shadow attacks, dealing 70% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.
primary.desc: Summon a clone that follows your movements and copies your attacks after a short delay
details: Clone's attacks are all dark-attribute and can activate the following skills with reduced %Final Damage: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}>
Attacks are limited to Throwing Star skills and Movement skills
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Darkness Ascending
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150. When hit by an attack that would prove fatal, recover 50% of Max HP per 3 sec. If Shadow Bats are currently summoned, they are consumed to recover 10% extra HP per bat.\nInvincible for 2 sec while recovering, and again at the end of skill.\nUpon consuming buff - Cooldown: 1800 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, when hit by a fatal attack, you will not die and instead continuously heal back a percentage of your HP
details: If there are <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}> bats summoned, they are consumed to recover extra HP
Briefly invincible during recovery and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Shadow Momentum
primary.shortDesc: Move a certain distance to obtain inertia for 30 sec, stacks up to Lv. 3.\nPermanently increases Final Damage by 20%
primary.desc: When you move a certain distance, you gain a stacking buff of Inertia
details: [Inertia]: Based on stacks, Throw-type skills can be used and cancelled faster
Also permanently increases %Final Damage
Unaffected by %Buff Duration
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF
[Note]: Top animation is without Shadow Momentum

primary.name: Bat Affinity II
primary.shortDesc:
Shadow Bat's Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 150% points, Number of Bounces: +1
Summons enhanced Shadow Bat for every 5 Shadow Bats summoned.
Enhanced Shadow Bat: 100% chance to fly towards target when using a Throwing Star skill to inflict 420% damage, then bounce off 6 enemies and inflict the same amount of damage before disappearing. Creates an explosion for every attack that deals 140% damage 3 times up to 3 enemies nearby.
If a single enemy receives several explosions, Final Damage is decreased by 50% starting with the second explosion.
Enhanced Shadow Bat Damage Against Normal Enemies: +35%
details: Increases activation chance, number of bounces, and %p Damage
Increases the maximum number of bats up to 4

Every 5 bats summoned, an enhanced bat is summoned that has a guaranteed chance to trigger upon a successful Throwing Star attack<bp_Each time the bat attacks, it triggers an explosion that damages nearby enemies_Enemies hit by multiple explosions take reduced %Final Damage after the first explosion_Bat deals increased %Damage to regular monsters_>

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness II
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 50%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 4
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack and damage over time dealt per stack

primary.name: Spirit Projection
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10. Enables use of skills without consuming Throwing Stars.
details: Uses the Throwing Star with the highest Attack to calculate your damage
Not usable if there are no Throwing Stars in your inventory

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Alchemic Adrenaline
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Amount: +170%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Recovery is not increased for percentage-based items like Elixirs

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, awakened Empress appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Quintuple Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Throwing Stars Cost: 5, Damage: 253% 4 times, Damage: 1010% 1 time
primary.desc: Throw 5 stars at a single enemy
details: The last star will deal increased damage
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Dark Omen
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 110, Bat Pack Duration: 7, Max Enemies Hit every 0.3 sec.: 6, Damage: 370%, Number of Attacks: 6
[When Shadow Bat is Active] Weakened Bat Pack Duration: 60, Max Enemies Hit every 1.5 sec.: Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 2
Summon 1 Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat per 3 enemies  hit.
Max Bats: 1.
Cooldonw: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Summon a stationary pack of bats that damages enemies within it
details: While <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}> is toggled, a weaker but longer version is summoned instead
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and you cannot be pushed back at all when casting this skill (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Shadow Stitch
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 66, Condense surrounding shadows by holding the key up to 5 sec.
Releasing will detonate the condensed shadows. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 3. Attacked enemies incapacitated for 10 sec. Incapacitation increases by 1 sec, up to 12 sec, for every 0.5 sec of the condensed duration
Bind Duration: Up to +100%, depending on damage inflicted with Shadow Stitch.
Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: While held, charges a condensed explosion that binds enemies upon release
details: Bind duration increases based on how long the skill was held
While held, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ravenous Bat
primary.shortDesc: Summons a Ravenous Bat for 60 sec for every 3 times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: 5.\nWhen using a Throwing Star skill, there is a 100% chance to fly towards the target and inflict 480% damage 2 times. Recovers 1% of Max HP upon hitting.
primary.desc: While toggled, every 3 successful Throwing Star attacks, a Ravenous Bat is summoned that strikes a nearby enemy upon successful Throwing Star attacks
details: Additional bats are summoned based on the number of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> stacks are on an enemy
Can not be used at the same time as <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}>
Attack will restore some %Max HP
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Bat Affinity III
primary.shortDesc:
Shadow Bat's Attack Chance: 30%, Max Summon Limit: 1, Damage: 200% points, Number of Bounces: +1
Enhanced Shadow Bat Damage: +200% points, Explosion Damage: +60% points
Shadow Bat Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
Summons enhanced Ravenous Bat for every 5 Ravenous Bats summoned.
Enhanced Ravenous Bat: 100% chance to fly towards target when using a Throwing Star skill to inflict 480% damage 3 times, recovers 5% of Max HP upon hitting
details: Increases activation chance, number of bounces, %p Damage, and %Damage against regular monsters
Increases the maximum number of bats up to 5
Increases %p Damage of enhanced bats and now restores %Max HP upon hitting<bp_Now prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first_>

primary.name: Adaptive Darkness III
primary.shortDesc: Chance to place Mark of Darkness: 5%, Maximum Stacking Limit: 1, DoT Per Stack: 50%, Defense Rate Ignored Per Mark: +1%.
details: Increases chance to apply debuff
Increases max stacks of debuff up to 5
Increases %Ignore DEF provided per stack and damage dealt over time per stack

Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Throwing Expert
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Vitality Siphon
primary.shortDesc: Absorbs life force from your enemies when laying the Mark of Darkness with Dark Elemental. When life force absorbed reaches 30, it will all be consumed, and a Protective Shield that blocks damage that is 10% of Max HP will be created for 15 sec.\nAbsorbed life force will be maintained for 15 sec, and this time will reset when you set the Mark of Darkness
primary.desc: Applying stacks of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> will grant stacks of 'Life Force' used to gain a shield
details: At 30 stacks of Life Force, gain a shield that absorbs damage

Life Force stacks disappear if more stacks are not gained<bp_Stack duration refreshes upon applying stacks of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}>_>
Unaffected by %Buff Duration

primary.name: Dark Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Ignore Defense: +15%, Final Damage: +8%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Shadow Slip
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: +40%, Damage Taken: -10%

hyperActive.name: Shadow Illusion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Summons Duration: 30 sec. Your shadow attacks, dealing 70%, 50%, and 30% of the Final Damage of your throwing skills.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons 3 clones that function like <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-servant.png} tip={Dark Servant (3rd Job)}>
details: Each clone deals a reduced amount of %Final Damage

Clone's attacks are all dark-attribute and can activate the following skills with reduced %Final Damage: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}>
Attacks are limited to Throwing Star skills and Movement skills
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Dominion
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 10. Grants invincibility during skill casting.
Use Throwing Stars skill within 30 sec of skill to receive Mark of Darkness at max stacks, increase max summon limit of Shadow Bats and Ravenous Bats by 3, and summon bats.
While active, Final Damage: +20%, Critical Rate: +100%
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a dark attack that leaves the map in a stasis
details: Grants invincibility during initial skill cast

While active, increases %Final Damage and %Crit Rate and increases summon limit of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}>

While active, using Throwing Star skills will continuously summon bats and cause enemies to gain max stacks of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}>
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the gray background ON/OFF while the attack is active

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Shadow Spear
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 87. shadows form on the ground every time you use a dark attribute skill (except Shadow Spear and summons).
The shadows slowly gather into a spear dealing 415% damage 2 times on up to 8 enemies
If there are enough shadows, they'll form into a giant spear, with a 3.9 sec. cooldown, that deals 880% damage 6 times on up to 12 enemies
All the Shadow Spear's attacks increase Damage Against Normal Monsters by 25%
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, dark energy gathers upon using a Dark-attribute attack until a spear forms and strikes enemies from beneath
details: Shadow Spear and summons cannot gather dark energy
The spear will slowly grow in size until it becomes a giant spear that deals increased %Damage
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Greater Dark Servant
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Summon Duration: 45 sec. Shadow attacks from a fixed location, dealing additional 55% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.
Activate to swap places up to 3 times
Shadow Re-summon Cooldown: 1.5 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a stationary clone that faces in the direction of the enemy with the highest Max HP and copies your Throwing Star attacks
details: Clone's attacks are all dark-attribute and can activate the following skills with reduced %Final Damage: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-elemental.png} tip={Dark Elemental (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}>
Pressing the Skill Key allows you to swap places with the clone (up to 3 times)<bp_Cannot be done while in the air_>
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together re-summons the clone at your position
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Shadow Bite
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 14, deals 1485% damage to boss monsters, creates a Shadow Bat where an enemy received an attack if a Shadow Bat can be summoned\nIf an enemy has been defeated by Shadow Bite, the Final Damage increases by 2% per 1 enemy for 20 sec. If you attacked a boss monster, the Final Damage increases by 18%. The Final Damage increased by Shadow Bite is applied up to 20%.\nCooldown: 15 sec
fifthMain.desc: Bats attack nearby enemies and summons <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat (1st Job)}>/<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/ravenous-bat.png} tip={Ravenous Bat (4th Job)}> at their location
details: Enemies defeated by the attack grant a stacking %Final Damage buff<bp_If the enemy hit was a boss, grants more %Final Damage_>
Deals increased damage to bosses

fifthMain.name: Rapid Throw
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, consecutively throw shadow throwing stars with 1045% damage 5 times for 1.8 sec then finish with a huge shadow throwing star that attacks up to 10 enemies with 1870% damage 13 times
Dark Sight for 4 sec while skill is in use. Tap repeatedly to increase the consecutive throwing duration up to 3 sec
While Shadow Spear is active, Consecutive Throw Attack Damage: +290% points
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Consecutively throws stars forward before throwing a final giant throwing star
details: Continuously pressing the Skill Key will extend the duration of the consecutive attack
Each throwing star is only considered at most once as a successful Throwing Star attack
Attacking during <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> will not deactivate while casting
When <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-spear.png} tip={Shadow Spear (5th Job)}> is active, it cannot form dark energy but, increases %p Damage of the consecutive attack
When used in the air, you will remain in the air until the attack ends

fifthBoost.name: Lucky Seven Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Triple Throw Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Quad Star Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shadow Spark Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Quintuple Star Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dark Omen Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shadow Stitch Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dominion Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/quintuple-star.png} tip={Quintuple Star (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Quintuple Star
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 52, Throwing Stars Cost: 5
Damage: 330% 4 times, Damage: 1320% 1 time
Every 6 seconds, the last attack is enhanced to Jet Black Throwing Stars.
------Jet Black Throwing Stars------
MP Cost: 52, Throwing Stars Cost: 5, Damage: 330% 4 times
The final attack is enhanced Jet Black Throwing Stars that strike up to 8 enemies with 300% damage 7 times
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/shadow-bat.png} tip={Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat (1st Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Shadow Bat
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Summon a Shadow Bat for 60 sec for every 3 times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: 2.
When using a Throwing Star skill, there is a 50% chance for it to fly towards the target and inflict 1200% damage, then bounce off 3 enemies and inflict the same amount of damage before disappearing.
Normal Enemy Damage: +85%, Does not stack with Shadow Bat and Bat Affinity III.
Recovers 1% of Max HP on first damage.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ravenous Bat
masteryCore.shortDesc: Summon a Ravenous Bat for 60 sec for every 3 times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: 5.\nWhen using a Throwing Star skill, there is a 100% chance to fly towards the target and inflict 980% damage 2 times. Recovers 1% of Max HP upon hitting.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dark-omen.png} tip={Dark Omen (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Dark Omen
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 122, Bat Pack Duration: 7, Max Enemies Hit every 0.3 sec.: 6, Damage: 820%, Number of Attacks: 6
[When Shadow Bat is Active] Weakened Bat Pack Duration: 60, Max Enemies Hit every 1.5 sec.: 6, Damage: 535%, Number of Attacks: 2
Summon 1 Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat per 3 enemies hit.
Max Bats: 1.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/night-walker/dominion.png} tip={Dominion (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Dominion
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 410, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2000%, Number of Attacks: 10. Grants invincibility during skill casting.
Use the Throwing Stars skill within 30 sec. of skill to receive Mark of Darkness at max stacks, increase max summon limit of Shadow Bats and Ravenous Bats by 3, and summon bats.
While active, Final Damage: +20%, Critical Rate: +100%, Reset cooldown when ending Dominion while maintaining Shadow Momentum's Inertia at max.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Abyssal Darkness
masteryCore.shortDesc: Number of Throwing Star Skills excluding Rapid Throw Landed for Abyssal Strike: 12, Damage: 427%, Number of Attacks: 6\nAbyssal Strike damage increases with each stack of Mark of Darkness, Max Stacks: 5
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Silence
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Chase Cuts occur 34 times which attack up to 15 enemies with 945% damage 12 times
For 30 seconds, when the attack htis, the Shadow Bat transforms into 3 huge Shadow Throwing Stars to track and attack the enemy
Shadow Throwing Stars: attack 12 times with 900% damage, after hitting the enemy, the Shadow Throwing Stars attack by bouncing up to 5 times, Shadow Throwing Stars Recreation Cooldown: 3 seconds
Cooldown: 360 seconds

boostCore.name: Greater Dark Servant Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Greater Dark Servant Final Damage: 85%, Duration increased to 55 sec

boostCore.name: Shadow Bite Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Shadow Bite Final Damage: +60%, Final Damage: +6% per enemy defeated with Shadow Bite, Boss Final Damage: 20%, Cooldown reduced to 10 sec

meta: Night Walker is LUK thief class part of the Cygnus Knights. Night Walkers are known for their bossing capabilities. Additionally, they use Throwing Stars as ammo for their skills
